permissions: User must be an admin or be authorized to update the related key result (per KeyResultPolicy update?).
side_effects: Creates a key result unscrappage action and restores the key result status from scrapped to the most recent non-scrapped status, or to unknown when none exists.
validation_notes: Requires --key-result. The key result ID must be an integer and refer to an existing key result. The key result must currently be in scrapped status; otherwise validation fails. Model-level validations on the key result are enforced.

flags.name: --key-result
flags.validation: Must reference an existing key result in scrapped status.

flags.name: --comment
flags.description: Comment for the unscrappage. Example: Restoring key result.
